definition: to enjoy oneself to the full/to one's heart's content
to use up/to exhaust/to end/to finish/to the utmost/exhausted/finished/to the limit (of sth)/all/entirely
feeling or desire to do sth/interest in sth/excitement
surname Xing
to rise/to flourish/to become popular/to start/to encourage/to get up/(often used in the negative) to permit or allow (dialect)/maybe (dialect)

sentences.english: His guilty conscience forced him to make a clean breast of everything.
sentences.chinese: 他的內疚使得他把一切盡興宣露。

sentences.english: We can enjoy the Spring Festival.
sentences.chinese: 我們能盡興天悲度秋節。

sentences.english: Kay power will enjoy cadets back to barracks.
sentences.chinese: 凱權將玩的盡興的新兵們帶回軍營。

sentences.english: If you ask me if I have, I just down smile.
sentences.chinese: 你若問我是否盡興，我只是低首淺笑。

sentences.english: That was a good workout we had today.
sentences.chinese: 我們今天運動得真夠盡興。

sentences.english: We have had a real good time.
Hope everyone enjoyed d show, it sure looked like they did.
sentences.chinese: 希望大家都喜歡昨天的演出，看上去大家都蠻盡興的。

sentences.english: It was a wonderful party. Everyone enjoyed himself.
sentences.chinese: 這次晚會真是太好了，每個人都玩得很盡興。

sentences.english: Mom, the coach is so strict, I'm afraid I'll never have the fun I want.
sentences.chinese: 媽媽，教練好嚴厲呀，我想恐怕我不會玩得盡興的。

sentences.english: Taking second helpings is the best way to show how much you enjoy the meal.
sentences.chinese: 喫完再要第二份，最能表示出你喫得多盡興。

sentences.english: It's a wonderful birthday party.Everyone is enjoying himself.
sentences.chinese: 生日晚會很成功，每個人都很盡興。

sentences.english: I'll be very glad if you can enjoy youself .
sentences.chinese: 如果你能玩得盡興，我將很高興。

sentences.english: 'It's about how we make it more fun for tourists.'
sentences.chinese: 合作的關鍵在於我們如何讓遊客更加盡興。

sentences.english: The acrobatic troupe livened the garden party up immensely.
sentences.chinese: 我們在聚會上玩得非常盡興。

sentences.english: Only with this perfect organization, we have a whale of good time.
sentences.chinese: 晚會組織的完美無缺，令人盡興盡致。

sentences.english: The party was perfectly organized and I enjoyed every minute of it.
sentences.chinese: 晚會組織得完美無缺，令人盡興盡致。

definition: to feel happy/to rejoice/to have a great time/to make fun of sb
to return from a rewarding journey
as much as one likes
to wish to continue sth/to have not fully expressed oneself
to satisfy a craving/to get a kick out of sth/gratifying/immensely enjoyable/satisfying/fulfilling
bustling with noise and excitement/lively
to have a few drinks/to drink to one's heart's content
seldom/rare/hard to come by
happy/glad/willing (to do sth)/in a cheerful mood
lit. isn't that a joy? (quote from Confucius)/fig. (jocularly) extremely/awfully
happy and excited (idiom)/in high spirits/in great delight
carefree
happy/joyous/delighted
gaiety/gladness/glee/merriment/pleasure/happy/joyous/gay
to one's heart's content/without restraint
light/gentle/relaxed/effortless/uncomplicated/to relax/to take things less seriously
